001package io.cyborgcode.roa.db.exceptions;
002
003/**
004 * Exception representing database operation failures.
005 *
006 * <p>This exception is thrown when a database query or connection operation
007 * encounters an error, such as an invalid query, connection failure, or
008 * unexpected database response.
009 *
010 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
011 */
012public class DatabaseOperationException extends RuntimeException {
013
014   /**
015    * Constructs a new {@code DatabaseOperationException} with the specified message and cause.
016    *
017    * @param message The detail message explaining the reason for the exception.
018    * @param cause   The underlying cause of the exception.
019    */
020   public DatabaseOperationException(String message, Throwable cause) {
021      super(message, cause);
022   }
023
024   /**
025    * Constructs a new {@code DatabaseOperationException} with the specified message.
026    *
027    * @param message The detail message explaining the reason for the exception.
028    */
029   public DatabaseOperationException(String message) {
030      super(message);
031   }
032
033}
